title: Horrible, but terrific
review: In just a few words, I would describe Requiem as the most moving film I´ve ever seen. But it was also the most disgusting. I had been warned, so I sat at the last row of seats in the theater. Anyway, I was like in a dream fuzz for more than an hour after the movie had ended and the characters had sunken into hell. And it wasn´t a sweet dream.I have listed my 100 favourites movies. This is my no. 10. But if you like ordinary American happy ending films, this may not be your cup of tea.
